Package helper

Class AppointmentsQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.AppointmentsQuery
  • public class AppointmentsQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains various methods of querying the database for appointment information

      • selectAppointmentsListWeek

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> selectAppointmentsListWeek​(int weekOffSet,
                                                                                         java.lang.String timeZone)
                                                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for all appointments within the provided weekOffSet, and converts them to the local users time zone
        Parameters:
        weekOffSet - the number of weeks ahead or behind the current week we're searching the database for
        timeZone - the current users time zone offset
        Returns:
        AppointmentList object containing all the appointments within the time interval specified
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for all appointments for a given contact within the provided weekOffSet, and converts them to the local users time zone
        Parameters:
        weekOffSet - the number of weeks ahead or behind the current week we're searching the database for
        contactID - the ID of the contact that is being searched for
        timeZone - the current users' time zone offset
        Returns:
        AppointmentList object containing all the appointments for the specified client within the time interval input
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        Searches the database for the appointment information based on the passed in appointmentID value

      • selectByUserWithTime

        public static java.sql.ResultSet selectByUserWithTime​(int userID,
                                                      java.lang.String timeZone,
                                                      java.lang.String logInTime)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for appointments for the passed in User within 15 minutes of the specified logInTime
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the user that is being searched for
        timeZone - the current users' time zone offset
        logInTime - the current time stamp passed in to compare appointment times against
        Returns:
        A ResultSet of appointments for the given User within the specified time frame.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • selectByTime

        public static java.sql.ResultSet selectByTime​(java.lang.String timeZone)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for appointments and returns them after handling time zone conversion for the users' timezone
        Parameters:
        timeZone - the current users' time zone offset
        Returns:
        a ResultSet with all the appointments in the database after handling time zone conversion for the users' timezone
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                                  java.lang.String timeZone)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        customer_id - ID of the customer to search for
        timeZone - time zone of the current user
        Returns:
        A list of the appointments in the system for the current user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • selectTotals

        public static java.sql.ResultSet selectTotals()
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for all appointments, and sorts them by Month, and then by Type, so you can see how many of each type of appointment are scheduled each month
        Returns:
        a ResultSet containing all of the appointments grouped by month, and then type
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • selectTesting

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> selectTesting​(java.lang.String timeZone)
                                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for all appointments in the database where the Type field contains the characters 'test', or 'Test' anywhere in the field
        Parameters:
        timeZone - the current users' time zone offset
        Returns:
        an ObservableList of appointments containing 'test', or 'Test' anywhere in the Type field
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insert

        public static int insert​(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String start,
                         java.lang.String end,
                         java.lang.String timeZoneOffset,
                         java.lang.String createdBy,
                         int customerID,
                         int userID,
                         int contactID)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the appointment to be created
        description - the description of the appointment to be created
        location - the location of the appointment to be created
        type - the type of the appointment to be created
        start - the start of the appointment to be created
        end - the end of the appointment to be created
        timeZoneOffset - the current users' time offset
        createdBy - the user that is creating the appointment
        customerID - the ID of the customer to associate with the appointment
        userID - the ID of the user to associate with the appointment
        contactID - the ID of the contact to associate with the appointment
        Returns:
        an integer to indicate whether the insert was successful, non-zero value indicating success
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • update

        public static int update​(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         int customerID,
                         java.lang.String userName,
                         int contactID,
                         int appointmentID,
                         int assignedUserID,
                         java.lang.String start,
                         java.lang.String end,
                         java.lang.String userTZ)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the appointment to be updated
        description - the description of the appointment to be updated
        location - the location of the appointment to be updated
        type - the type of the appointment to be updated
        customerID - the ID of the customer to associate with the appointment
        userName - the username of the user making the update
        contactID - the ID of the contact to associate with the appointment
        appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to update
        assignedUserID - the ID of the user to associate with the appointment
        start - the start of the appointment to be updated
        end - the end of the appointment to be updated
        userTZ - the current users' time offset
        Returns:
        an integer to indicate whether the update was successful, non-zero value indicating success
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
